name: Mind Scan (Skill Card)
text:
Pegasus / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
At the start of the 3rd turn, if your LP is 6000 or higher, activate this Skill (count both players' turns).
You may look at your opponent's Set Spell & Trap Cards at anytime. If your LP drops below 6000, flip this card over.
§3Speed Duel Rules:
This Skill's LP requirements are 3000 LP instead of 6000 LP.§r
